entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.1°C

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the foothills. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the foothills this evening and after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
